hook_text: בן-גוריון קומיקס מארוול? הוא בלתי נמנע!

style_decision.reasoning: The prompt explicitly mentions 'Marvel comic explosion,' 'comic smoke,' and 'exploding panels,' strongly indicating a comic book art style. Vibrant colors are typical of comic art and will appeal to a general Instagram audience. The energetic and dynamic descriptions lend themselves perfectly to the comic medium.

positioning_decision.reasoning: The text describes a narrative with elements like '    ' (Israeli flag in the top left corner) and other visual cues. Placing the overlay in the top left will align with this specific instruction and keep the main visual content (the comic-style portrayal of Ben-Gurion) unobstructed. Instagram's recommendation to avoid the bottom 20% further supports a top or middle placement.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/israeli_pm_marvel_ep1_he/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='‏⚡️ בלתי נמנע ⚡️':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=50:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,3.8\,6.0),drawtext=text='‏קא-פאו 💥':fontcolor=#C44569:fontsize=52:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,12.5\,14.5),drawtext=text='‏⚡️ בניית קיבוץ ⚡️':fontcolor=#00D2D3:fontsize=50:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.95:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,18.0\,21.0),drawtext=text='‏הוא יחזור 🇮🇱':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=58:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@1.0:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,24.5\,27.0),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=58:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00A9@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,22.26\,23.66),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=58:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00A9@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,23.76\,25.16) -c:a copy -y outputs/israeli_pm_marvel_ep1_he/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
